alert.note: Alert for Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:12AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN TANEY AND SOUTHERN STONE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 AM CDT... At 612 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Kimberling City to near Roberson Hollow. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Branson, Table Rock Lake, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock State Park, Bull Shoals Lake, Hollister, Silver Dollar City, Kimberling City, Forsyth, Shell Knob, Kissee Mills, Indian Point, Table Rock, Kirbyville, Blue Eye, Coney Island, Powersite, Lampe, Ridgedale and Ozark Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
